59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361f.name: Winds of War
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361f.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361f.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e0.name: Tiger Stance
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e0.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e0.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3661.name: Permafrost
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3661.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3661.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s).

An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c1.name: Justice Punch
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c1.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c1.tooltip: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3628.name: Parrrley
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3628.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3628.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3637.name: Conquering Sands
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3637.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3637.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e3.name: Phoenix Stance
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e3.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e3.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b7.name: Corrosive Charge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b7.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b7.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3673.name: Defensive Ball Curl
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3673.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3673.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}/{{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3620.name: Shield of Durand
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3620.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3620.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})% Damage Reduction but slowing himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d1.name: Friend of the Forest
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d1.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to recieve gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37be.name: Blaze
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37be.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds for massive damage in an area around the victim.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae7.name: Archangel's Staff
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae7.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b4d.name: Tear of the Goddess (Quick Charge)
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b4d.description:
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 6 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 8 seconds).

Caps at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae4.name: Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge)
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae4.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +12 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ab8.name: Frozen Heart
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ab8.description:
+90 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae3.name: Manamune (Quick Charge)
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae3.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +6 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

59f3af948bf5501e050f2bf4.name: Ardent Censer
59f3af948bf5501e050f2bf4.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Whenever you heal or shield an ally, you and your ally gain 20% - 35% Attack Speed and your attacks deal an additional 20 - 35 on-hit magic damage for 6 seconds.

This does not include regeneration effects. Bonus effects are based on target's level.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae6.name: Manamune
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ae6.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +4 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b42.name: Tear of the Goddess
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b42.description:
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 4 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 8 seconds).

Caps at +750 Mana.
